divs: Sighting DetailsNear Covington, Ludlow, KentuckyWitnesses observes three starilike objects approach and de-accelerate to a standstill from their vantage points near the LudlowCovington area. The objects hoverfor a duration, possbily as long as an hour, before moving off. Sighting beganat dusk, lasted until darkness, seen to the north over Cincinnati, Ohio, and wasbetween late May or early June of 2002. Claimants interviewed by researcherKenny Young on SATURDAY, FEBRUARY 14, 2004
Summary: Objects, first thought to be shooting stars, come
trends: There have been no other sightings in CovingtonLudlow area
This sighting has never been favorited.
